data.title: citylife church
data.text:
Text giving uses industry-leading security to protect your personal information, and is never charged to your phone bill. Currently only available in the US.

To give via text, text the keyword (space) and then the amount (I.e. Tithe 100) to 844-311-1777. Keywords: tithe, offering and missions. (If only the amount is texted without a keyword, the funds will go to a default category.) Add a contact to your phone’s contacts such as “Text to citylife” or “Text to Give” using the number above for future use.

Text giving uses industry-leading security to protect your personal information, and is never charged to your phone bill. Currently only available in the US.

To give via text, text the keyword (space) and then the amount (I.e. Tithe 100) to 844-311-1777. Keywords: tithe, offering and missions. (If only the amount is texted without a keyword, the funds will go to a default category.) Add a contact to your phone’s contacts such as “Text to citylife” or “Text to Give” using the number above for future use.

Click the link to login to our secure online giving platform, or sign up to create account.

Choose recurring donation, then select your campus. Choose your recurring amount and where you would like those contributions applied. Select your withdrawal dates and how often your would like to give.

Click the link to login to our secure online giving platform, or sign up to create account.

Choose recurring donation, then select your campus. Choose your recurring amount and where you would like those contributions applied. Select your withdrawal dates and how often your would like to give.

Click the link to login to your inFellowship account, or sign up to create one. Select “GIVING” and choose the year on the drop down menu, then click “View.” View contributions within the page, or click “Download Statement” to print a PDF. If creating a new account, please allow 24-48 hours for your giving to reflect.???
